description: Site plan sheet showing existing (E) site conditions and proposed (N) site plan for new ADU above existing garage. Includes existing and proposed utility locations, setback dimensions, site plan legend, fire rating notes, and first floor garage plan. Two site plans side-by-side with legend.
key_content: Existing two-story house: 1,600 sq.ft.
Existing garage: 14' wide
Side setback: 2' S.B. (left side at garage)
Side setback: 4' S.B. (right side at garage)
Property line dimension: 27' (side)
New ADU above existing garage (2nd floor)
New exterior stair to access ADU
New dedicated water meter for ADU
New gas line for ADU
1 HR fire-rated under-eaves per detail — projections within 5 ft from lot line
Mechanical units: minimum 3 ft clearance to property line
Existing water meter at front property line near sidewalk
Street frontage: Flint Ave
Alley access at rear
(E) Garage 1st Floor plan at 3/16" = 1' scale
APPROVED stamp signed by Anthony Montez — Building Plan Check
NOT SHOWN: lot total area (sq ft)
NOT SHOWN: lot coverage percentage
NOT SHOWN: FAR (floor area ratio)
NOT SHOWN: drainage direction / grading
NOT SHOWN: north arrow not clearly identified
NOT SHOWN: scale notation for main site plans
NOT SHOWN: rear setback dimension
NOT SHOWN: front setback dimension
NOT SHOWN: equipment pad locations (HVAC condenser)

drawing_zones.content: (E) Existing Site Plan — lot layout, existing structures, setbacks, utilities
(N) New Site Plan — proposed ADU, new stair, new utilities, parking
Site Plan Legend — symbol definitions for floor outlines, roof lines, property lines
Title block (vertical): project info, sheet A1
